meanings.definition: A hard protective covering worn on the head, often made of metal or plastic.
meanings.sent1: The football player wore a helmet during the game.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to wear your helmet when riding a bike.
meanings.sent3: The astronaut's helmet was so big, it looked like a giant bubble on his head.
meanings.sent4: Her helmet of confidence shielded her from self-doubt.
meanings.sent5: The shiny helmet gleamed under the bright sun.

meanings.definition: To provide or equip with a helmet for protection.
meanings.sent1: The construction worker will helmet all the workers before they start.
meanings.sent2: Remember to helmet yourself before entering the construction site.
meanings.sent3: He decided to helmet his pet turtle for a walk in the garden.
meanings.sent4: She helmeted her thoughts with positive affirmations.
meanings.sent5: The knight helmeted his loyal squire before the battle.
